scripts.sync:postman: dotenv -e .env -- powershell -Command "Invoke-WebRequest http://localhost:8000/openapi.json -OutFile \"${env:TEMP}\openapi.json\"; npx openapi-to-postmanv2 -s \"${env:TEMP}\openapi.json\" -o \"${env:TEMP}\collection.json\" -p -O folderStrategy=Tags; node ./scripts/patch-postman.mjs; node ./scripts/upload-postman.mjs;"
